rl.photoviewer.swing.view

Class PVView

  • java.lang.Object
    • rl.photoviewer.swing.view.PVView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Observer

    public class PVView
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Observer
    Defines the main frame of the Agile Photo Viewer application. It consists of a photo panel (showing a scaled image), a control panel (for navigation, slide show control etc.), an EXIF data view panel and a keyword panel.
    Author:
    Ruediger Lunde
